section_title: Report of the GEF to the COP
sentences: SBI first addressed this issue on Tuesday, 7 December.
Many Parties raised concern over the efficiency in the GEFs administrative costs, questioned co-financing requirements, and stressed that the GEF must follow the COPs guidance.
Japan said the COP should provide guidance to the GEF on project eligibility and criteria, but not on issues related to the GEFs management.
On Tuesday, 14 December, SBI adopted the conclusions, with a minor amendment.
enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
